scripts.contract:check: sh -c 'if lsof -i :5001 -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1 && lsof -i :8081 -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then node frontend/scripts/mpc07-contract-check.mjs; else npm run functions:build && firebase emulators:exec --only functions,firestore "node frontend/scripts/mpc07-contract-check.mjs"; fi'
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build --prefix frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build --prefix frontend && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run predeploy:verify:staging && firebase deploy --project staging
scripts.deploy:staging:hosting: npm run build --prefix frontend -- --mode staging && firebase deploy --only hosting --project staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run predeploy:verify:prod && firebase deploy --project prod
